###Extract HoG Features from images

```{r}
setwd("/Users/xuehan/Desktop/Spr2017-proj5-grp8/doc")
source("../lib/HOGFeature.R")
experiment_dir <- "../data/"
img_dir <- paste(experiment_dir, "Images_full/", sep="")
h<-hogfeature(img_dir,export=T)
h<-data.frame(h)
h$id<-file.names
write.csv(h,file="HoG.csv")
#HoG.csv is under the doc 

```
